name: TÃ¼rkiye Motosiklet Federasyonu Fan Token
description: What is Turkish Motorsports Federation Token? Turkish Motorsports Federation Token (TMFT) is a BRC-20 smart contract built on Bitcichain. TMFT Token offers fans the opportunity to participate in surveys and events, enjoy games and quests linked to digital collectibles, NFT purchases, fan rewards or great experiences. TMFT Token provides E-Commerce opportunity by being included in the potential ecosystem of the Spanish Federation in the future. It enables Voting, Donation, Exclusive Videos and more. Bitci Fan Tokens strengthen the bond between team and fans by giving fans new ways to interact and grow with their favorite teams. Highlights of the Project Blockchain Infrastructure: The Turkish Motorsports Federation Token was created on Bitcichain as a local BRC-20 Token. This provides fans with a wide range of token functions with greater accessibility and lower costs. Token Utility: Turkish Motorsports Federation Token offers a variety of fan engagement options, including limited collection and integration with the Bitci NFT Marketplace, interactive team rewards, exclusive privileges, voting rights, gamification, and exclusive brand experiences.
